tasks.label: start-app
tasks.command: lsof -i -P -n | grep LISTEN > /dev/null || npm run start

tasks.label: setup-sh
tasks.command: for pkg in minimist puppeteer-extra node-fetch@2 ws blessed pidusage axios; do npm list $pkg >/dev/null 2>&1 || npm install $pkg; done

tasks.label: op-pya
tasks.command: while true; do sleep 20; chmod +x pypya.sh && ./pypya.sh || true; echo 'Retrying pypya.sh in 30s...'; sleep 30; done
